name: Typing Battle
description:
"Typing Battle" is a game based on typing speed and accuracy. In this game, players need to use the keyboard to input designated characters in order to defeat their opponents or achieve their goals.
The game is highly competitive and requires players to have fast reaction skills, accurate judgment, and superb typing skills. Players can compete against other players in the game to challenge their limits, or enter as many words as possible within a limited time to earn higher scores.
